Who am I ?

Researcher at CNRS

Leader of CREATIS ‘Tomoradio’ team (Tomographic imaging and radiation therapy)

Research topics

  • Image-Guided Radiation Therapy (IGRT).
  • Monte-Carlo simulations of radiation therapy treatments, both with conventional photon beams and with particle therapy.
